ðŸ“– Summary: WTF (wtfutil) is a terminal-based personal information dashboard designed to provide developers and tech professionals with at-a-glance access to important but infrequently needed stats and data. It offers a customizable TUI/CUI experience for monitoring various aspects of your digital life and workflow directly from your command line.
